verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
F
Give thanks
With a grateful heart
Give thanks to the Holy One
Give thanks because He's given
Jesus Christ His Son

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give thanks
With a grateful heart
Give thanks to the Holy One
Give thanks because He's given
Jesus Christ His Son

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And now let the weak say
I am strong
Let the poor say
I am rich
Because of what
The Lord has done for us

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
And now let the weak say
I am strong
Let the poor say
I am rich
Because of what
The Lord has done for us
Give thanks
